title: 24 hour fitness center, Club Lounge, Stainless Steel Appliances
posting_body: DISCOVER LUXURIOUS AND ELEGANT HOLLYWOOD APARTMENTS
Welcome to Alaya Hollywood, an exclusive and unique luxury apartment community with a supreme level of comfort and flair.
Open the door to resort style amenities and jet set designs that evoke poise and elegance, all located in one place.
Imagine entering a place where you can have the luxury to escape from your daily routine; a unique space to unplug and disconnect.
Enjoy the sights of the hills, while relaxing in the comfort of one of the most desired communities in Los Angeles.
Use this link for more info:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 819 Sq.
- Energy efficient full-size stackable washer and dryer
- Gourmet Kitchen with Ivory Quartz Countertops
- Exceptional Hollywood views from a private terrace or balcony
- Thoughtfully designed 1 Bedroom, 2 Bedroom, and Loft apartment homes.
- A vibrant, highly pedestrian friendly district that's flooded with incredible places to eat, drink, and shop.
- Deluxe community amenities with clean details and luminous qualities
- Carefully designed spaces with Lushly landscaped grounds featuring tranquil water details
Price and availability subject to change
